签；签名；署；署（名）；签署；签字；在…上签字；示意；用手语交流；用手势表达；打信号；打手势；打手语；做标记；与（运动员、艺术家等）签订合同；和…签约

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 有符号的；已签字的；有正负之分的
署名；写下；预示；示意（sign的过去分词）
有重要性；要紧；冒充内行
使显眼；使著名；向…发信号
使…显著；用信号通知；庆祝；突出地表明

word_mean_info__list.difference: 多指无意识地发出表示沮丧、悲痛、悔恨或厌倦等情绪的深沉叹息。
侧重指因受到难忍受的精神负担或强烈的痛苦等而发出沉重的呻吟，也指显示强烈不满的叹息声。
语气比groan强，多指拉长的或连续的悲叹(声)或呻吟(声)。
指抽噎声或呜咽声，或边说边哭。
普通用词，指人们公认事物的记号，也可指某种情况的征兆。
指选定象征一个国家、民族或家庭等的图案或实物。
指作象征或表达某种深邃意蕴的特殊事物。
语气庄重，指礼品、纪念物等作为表示友谊、爱情等的象征或标志。
指人或物及其地位、属性的象征。
普通用词，含义广泛。既可指方便于辨认而有意做的标记，又可指自然形成的标记或有别于他事物的特征。
指为某一目的而有意发出的信号。
一般指金属证章或写有姓名的带状标志物。

word_group.brief_definition: 签约受雇；报名接受培训等；报名参军；达成交易
签约受雇；签约参加社团；失业注册
警告标志；警告信号；警告牌
在签字处签上姓名(表示同意)；签名同意
结束写信；登记停止领取失业救济；结束活动；下班登记；示弱止叫

bilingual.source: There was no sign of the storm.
There was no sign of Sami's homework.
Cramping can be a sign of dehydration.
bilingual.target: 抽筋可能是脱水的迹象。

bilingual.source: A high heart rate can be a sign of stress.
bilingual.target: 高心率可能是压力的迹象。

bilingual.source: Crepitus can be a sign of joint damage.
bilingual.target: 骨擦音可能是关节损伤的迹象。

bilingual.source: Papules can be a sign of an allergic reaction.
bilingual.target: 丘疹可能是过敏反应的迹象。

bilingual.source: Lymphadenectasis can be a sign of infection.
bilingual.target: 淋巴结肿大可能是感染的迹象。

bilingual.source: The baby's jerking was a sign of discomfort.
bilingual.target: 婴儿的抽搐是感到不适的迹象。

bilingual.source: Her countenance showed no sign of fear.
bilingual.target: 她的面容没有显示出任何恐惧的迹象。

bilingual.source: Hyperpyrexia can be a sign of a serious infection.
bilingual.target: 高热可能是严重感染的迹象。

list.abstract: sign（英[saɪn]，美[saɪn]），英语单词，作名词译为标记；标志；表示；手势，作动词译为签名于；签字于；打手势。短语搭配有sign up（签约受雇），例句：I photographed the sign for Hay Street.（我拍摄了海伊街的标志。） 该单词作名词时近义词为symbol，作不及物动词时近义词为subscribe，作及物动词时近义词为ink，复数为signs，第三人称单数为signs，现在分词为signing，过去式为signed，过去分词为signed。
《Sign》（싸인）是由朴新阳 、金雅中、殷志源、郑糠云等主演，张恒俊执导，金恩熙担任编剧的电视剧。于2011年1月5日在韩国播出。 该剧是韩国首部以验尸官为题材的电视剧，主要讲述了尹志勋（朴信阳 饰）、高多静（金雅中 饰）、全宇镇（殷志源 饰）等天才法医学者们通过发掘疑案中死者留下的线索，揭开不为人知的真相之谜的故事。

yingyinNormal.en: That is, until I saw my first sign of life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 直到我第一次亲眼目睹生命的迹象。

yingyinNormal.en: Sorry about that. There was rather a queue. It's popular. That's a good sign.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉，人好多。这里受欢迎，是个好迹象。

yingyinNormal.en: Good for you, Sign here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真好，签收吧。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm about to. Sign the paper.
yingyinNormal.zh: 快了，签你的字吧。

yingyinNormal.en: You Miss Geller? Okay. Sign here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 盖勒小姐吗？请签收。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know if I want to sign it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要是我说我不想签呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, I get it. He's a bad guy. Sign here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好的，我明白了，他是坏人。在这签名。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, a lot of people think I'm a water sign.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是，很多人会以为我是水相星座的。

yingyinNormal.en: Ooh, it'll be like a reunion then. Sign here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 啊，那这不就是重逢了嘛。在这签字。

yingyinNormal.en: I bet we could sell that sign all over Pasadena.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我打赌这种牌子一定能在帕萨迪纳大卖。

yingyinNormal.en: Give the little guy the sign, please. Here we are.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让这小个儿拿着牌子。好了。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, before we sign anything, we really have to talk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 签字前我们得谈谈。

yingyinNormal.en: Han, what sign are you? I'm guessing the 40-year-old Virgo.
yingyinNormal.zh: 阿憨，你是什么星座？我猜是《四十岁老处男》座。

yingyinNormal.en: I'd use Feynman's trick, differentiate under the integral sign. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会用费曼的秘诀积分，符合内取微分。不错嘛。

yingyinNormal.en: A sign of what?
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么事情的兆头?

yingyinNormal.en: You have a sarcasm sign? No, I do not have a sarcasm sign.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你有讽刺的牌子？不，我没有讽刺的牌子。

yingyinNormal.en: Once they find out they're getting a home, they sign where you tell them to sign.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只要他们想买房，给什么他们都会签的。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. You might want to put a sign on it. Sign right there. Ah. "Danger," sure, sure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或许你该在箱子上标记一下。标记在这里。"危险"，没错，没错。

yingyinNormal.en: Look at the sign. Sheldon, it's C. just put down C.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看看标志牌。谢尔顿，答案是"C"，就写"C"。

yingyinNormal.en: Excuse me. What? You have to sign this. What is it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等。怎么了？你要签收。这是什么？

exam_freq_info.chinese: (sign up)登记; 注册; 报名
动作; 手势; 示意
广告牌; 路牌; 标识

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 信号；暗号；表示；标志；起因；导火线；信号灯
n. 署名；签名；折标；标记；用法签；识别标志；鲜明特色；签字；书贴
adj. 重要的；值得注意的；显著的；有特定含义的；表示…的；有效的；意味深长的
v. 指示；表示；表明；相互吹牛；相互辱骂；要紧；作为…的符号；有… 的意思
n. 签署；手势语；标志设置；签约；最近签约受雇者；签名售书
adj. 有符号的；已签字的；有正负之分的

word_family.mean: n. 标记；标志；表示；手势；示意动作；宫；正负号；迹象；征兆；标牌

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 签约；雇用；报名(参加课程)
签约受雇；签约参加社团；失业注册

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>signing</highlight> the measure, California Governor admitted that the law, which expressly classifies people on the basis of sex, is probably unconstitutional.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加州州长在签署该法案时承认，该法案明确根据性别对人进行分类，可能是违宪的。

examination_example.sentence: Do not <highlight>sign</highlight> your own name at the end of the email.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不要在邮件末尾签上自己的名字。

examination_example.sentence: They had <highlight>signed</highlight> a range-wide management plan to restore prairie chicken habitat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们签署了一项旨在恢复草原鸡栖息地的大范围的管理计划。

sense_info_list.en: something that indicates what is present or is to come

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>sign</highlight> of economic recovery.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经济复苏的迹象。

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>sign</highlight> that those practices build up corporate value not just for the CEO.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这表明这些做法不仅为首席执行官创造了企业价值。

examination_example.sentence: It is not, however, a <highlight>sign</highlight> that they're getting serious about transforming the postal system for the 21st century.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，这并不是一个他们开始认真对待21世纪邮政系统变革的征兆。

examination_example.sentence: In adulthood, looking someone else in a pleasant way can be a complimentary <highlight>sign</highlight> of paying attention.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 成年后，以一种愉快的方式看着别人可能是一种表示关注的称赞标志。

examination_example.sentence: While eye contact may be a <highlight>sign</highlight> of connection or trust in friendly situations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然在友好的场景下，眼神交流可能是表示联系或信任的标志。

examination_example.sentence: That is how we have put a giant target <highlight>sign</highlight> on the backs of American workers, Hagel says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们就是这样在美国工人背上贴上巨大的目标标志，哈格尔说道。

sense_info_list.zh: (sign up)登记; 注册; 报名

examination_example.sentence: Businesses should engage in conversations with teams to review their privacy, and include in the discussion the marketers and advertisers responsible for <highlight>sign</highlight>-ups
examination_example.sentence_trans: 企业应该与团队进行对话，审查他们的隐私，并让负责注册的营销人员和广告商参与讨论

examination_example.sentence: Think about the times you felt tricked by a membership that had a seamless <highlight>sign</highlight>-up process but was later difficult to cancel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想想你被一个拥有无缝注册过程但后来很难取消的会员资格所欺骗的时候。

examination_example.sentence: Reding invited corporations to <highlight>sign</highlight> up for gender balance goals of 40 per cent female board membership.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 雷丁邀请各公司报名参加支持性别均衡的活动，旨在让女性在董事会占有40%的比例。

sense_info_list.en: a motion, action, or movement of the hand that means something
sense_info_list.zh: 动作; 手势; 示意

sense_info_list.en: a public notice that advertises something or gives information
sense_info_list.zh: 广告牌; 路牌; 标识

sense_info_list.en: one of the twelve parts of the zodiac
engage to work for one by signing a contract with them

word_usage.usage:
表示“迹象、征兆、预兆”
sign指某事属实、即将发生或存在着的迹象。
indication是指某事正在发生或某人所想所感的标示、象征。
indication常通过某人的说话表明，而sign通常为发生的事或某人所做的事。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: “信号、记号、征兆”，指无意的或有意的，自然的或人工的。
“符号、记号、代号、象征”，指用文字符号指代某事。
“信号”，指有意地、预定地发出的信号，引人注意。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 署名；签名；折标；标记；用法签；识别标志；鲜明特色；签字；书贴
n. 信号；暗号；表示；标志；起因；导火线；信号灯

sense_info_list.en: a public notice that advertises something or gives information
sense_info_list.zh: 广告牌; 路牌; 标识

examination_example.sentence: His car hit a <highlight>sign</highlight> and was badly damaged.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的车撞到一个标杆，损坏得很严重。

examination_example.sentence: His car rolled backwards, and in a striking display of irony, hit a <highlight>sign</highlight> saying "Rom".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的车向后翻了个身，极具讽刺意味地撞上了一个写着“Rom”的标志。

examination_example.sentence: Police said that the car had come to a halt after hitting the <highlight>sign</highlight>, but did not appear to be seriously damaged.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 警方表示，汽车在撞上标牌后停了下来，但似乎没有严重损坏。

sense_info_list.en: something that indicates what is present or is to come

examination_example.sentence: Co-author Mathew White, from the University of Exeter, UK, explained that the study showed people living in greener urban areas were displaying fewer <highlight>signs</highlight> of depression or anxiety.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 来自英国埃克塞特大学的合著者 Mathew White 解释说，该研究表明，生活在绿色城市地区的人们出现抑郁或焦虑迹象的情况较少。

examination_example.sentence: Forgetting how to drive to the house of a friend you've visited many times before can also be <highlight>signs</highlight> of something going wrong.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 忘记了如何开车去您曾经多次拜访过的朋友的家，也可能是出问题的迹象。

examination_example.sentence: There are pretty clear differences between <highlight>signs</highlight> of dementia and age-related memory loss.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 痴呆症和与年龄相关的记忆力下降的迹象之间有相当明显的区别。

examination_example.sentence: West Windsor-Plainsboro has not had a teenage suicide in recent years, but Aderhold, who has worked in the district for seven years and been chief for the last three years, said he had seen troubling <highlight>signs</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 西温莎-普兰斯伯勒(West Windsor-Plainsboro)近年来虽然没有发生青少年自杀事件，但在该地区工作了七年并在过去三年担任区长的阿德霍尔德表示，他看到了令人不安的迹象。

examination_example.sentence: For what purpose did the staff at a supermarket in Melbourne <highlight>sign</highlight> a letter?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 墨尔本一家超市的工作人员为什么在一封信上签名？

examination_example.sentence: More than 50 workers at the store have <highlight>signed</highlight> a letter calling for a permanent security guard following a series of incidents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在发生一系列事件后，50多名店员签署了一封公开信，呼吁设立一名永久的保安人员。

examination_example.sentence: He had to <highlight>sign</highlight> his name on every label.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他得在每个厂牌上签名。

sense_info_list.en: a motion; action; or movement of the hand that means something
sense_info_list.zh: 动作; 手势; 指示

word_usage.usage: show signs of表示“显出…的迹象”，其中sign习惯用复数。
sign作“签名，签字”时可用于被动结构，作“发信号，做手势”时不用于被动结构。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 署名；签名；折标；标记；用法签；识别标志；鲜明特色；签字；书贴
n. 信号；暗号；表示；标志；起因；导火线；信号灯

word_family.mean: n. 标记；标志；表示；手势；示意动作；宫；正负号；迹象；征兆；标牌

examination_example.sentence: I began looking into college courses for Fashion Design and three months later I <highlight>signed</highlight> up for a part-time design course.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我开始研究大学的时装设计课程，三个月后，我报名参加了一个兼职设计课程。

examination_example.sentence: The hundreds of scholars who <highlight>signed</highlight> the letter are intent (执着) on quieting hope that ignores preparedness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这封信上签了名的数百名学者，他们的目的是平息人们无视准备的希望。

examination_example.sentence: Before choices are finalized, parents/carers will be asked to <highlight>sign</highlight> to confirm their children's choices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在最终决定之前，家长/监护人将被要求签字确认孩子的选择。

sense_info_list.en: a motion, action, or movement of the hand that means something
sense_info_list.zh: 动作; 手势; 指示

examination_example.sentence: I never felt an urge to learn any <highlight>sign</highlight> language before.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我以前从未有过学习任何手语的冲动。

sense_info_list.en: a public notice that advertises something or gives information

examination_example.sentence: Bonds still has each of his cowboys inspect 300 or 400 cattle daily and look for <highlight>signs</highlight> that an animal is getting sick.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 邦兹仍然让他的每个牛仔每天检查300或400头牛，寻找动物生病的迹象。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 广告牌; 路牌; 标识
迹象; 象征; 表示
登记; 注册; 报名
动作; 手势; 指示; 示意

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 署名；签名；折标；标记；用法签；识别标志；鲜明特色；签字；书贴
adj. 有符号的；已签字的；有正负之分的
n. 信号；暗号；表示；标志；起因；导火线；信号灯

word_family.mean: n. 标记；标志；表示；手势；示意动作；宫；正负号；迹象；征兆；标牌

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 签约受雇；报名接受培训等；报名参军；达成交易
警告标志；警告信号；警告牌

sense_info_list.en: a public notice that advertises something or gives information
sense_info_list.zh: 广告牌; 路牌; 标识

examination_example.sentence: Then I noticed that the street <highlight>signs</highlight> were written in both Chinese and English.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，我注意到路牌是用中文和英文写的。

examination_example.sentence: When Dan got to class the next day, he saw a <highlight>sign</highlight> on the wall.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当丹第二天去上课时，他看到墙上有个广告牌。

examination_example.sentence: Please put the rubbish into different litter bins according to the <highlight>signs</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请根据标志把垃圾放进不同的垃圾箱里。

sense_info_list.en: something that indicates what is present or is to come
sense_info_list.zh: 迹象; 象征; 表示

examination_example.sentence: It's a <highlight>sign</highlight> that there will be enough rain during the night.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是夜间雨水充足的迹象。

examination_example.sentence: Noodles are a <highlight>sign</highlight> of long life for us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对我们来说，面条是长寿的象征。

examination_example.sentence: We see the warning <highlight>signs</highlight> and signals when things get rough and difficult.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当事情变得艰难时，我们会看到警告迹象和信号。

examination_example.sentence: We cannot <highlight>sign</highlight> a bill or write a letter or buy a house without our pen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有笔，我们就不能签单、写信或买房。

examination_example.sentence: Many people like to <highlight>sign</highlight> their name on the inside cover.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多人喜欢在封面内签上自己的名字。

examination_example.sentence: We cannot be married till we have <highlight>signed</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 签了字我们才能结婚。

sense_info_list.zh: 登记; 注册; 报名

examination_example.sentence: My mom <highlight>signs</highlight> me up for camps and activities without asking what I want to do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我妈妈没有问我想做什么就给我报名参加夏令营和活动。

examination_example.sentence: The students who do not <highlight>sign</highlight> up before Friday lunchtime won't be able to choose their afternoon activities next week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 周五午餐前没有报名的学生下周将无法选择下午的活动。

examination_example.sentence: We are inviting you to <highlight>sign</highlight> up for free to help your child be an active reader this summer!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们邀请您免费注册，帮助您的孩子在今年夏天成为一名积极活跃的读者！

sense_info_list.en: a motion, action, or movement of the hand that means something
sense_info_list.zh: 动作; 手势; 指示; 示意

examination_example.sentence: They give him high fives in the halls, and he even teaches them <highlight>sign</highlight> language.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在大厅里和他击掌，他甚至教他们手语。

examination_example.sentence: Does anyone on board know American <highlight>Sign</highlight> Language?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 船上有人懂美国手语吗？

examination_example.sentence: When Anthony walked into a classroom, a group of children started to <highlight>sign</highlight>(打手势) and sing "Happy Birthday" to him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当安东尼走进一间教室时，一群孩子开始打手势并给他唱“生日快乐”歌。

sense_info_list.en: a written or printed mark that has a standard meaning

examination_example.sentence: Thank Ray Tomlinson for inventing the email and making the @ <highlight>sign</highlight> well-known.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 感谢雷·汤姆林森发明了电子邮件，并让@符号广为人知。

examination_example.sentence: He chose the @ <highlight>sign</highlight> to separate (区别于) local from global (全球的) emails in the mailing address.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他选择了@符号来区别邮件地址中的本地邮件和全球邮件。

examination_example.sentence: I used the '@' <highlight>sign</highlight> to show that the user was 'at' some other hosts (电脑主机) rather than being local.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我用“@”符号来表示用户“在”其他电脑主机，而不是在本地主机。

word_usage.usage: sign作“签名，签字”时可用于被动结构，作“发信号，做手势”时不用于被动结构。
show signs of表示“显出…的迹象”，其中sign习惯用复数。
